name: mr-mustache-codespace
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; cd /workspaces/mr.mustache/mr-mustache-assistant || true; npm install || true; npm install -g vsce || true; vsce package || true; for f in *.vsix; do if [ -f "$f" ]; then code --install-extension "$f" || true; fi; done; echo Devcontainer ready'
